T02D2730:107b-1: ma ni dv'i pa ma h'a k'a ru ni ka de ba panytsa sto tra /
T02D2730:107b-3: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa /
T02D2730:107b-4: rje btsun spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2730:107b-5: nor bu'i gling du thugs rje'i sku 'khrungs dpal ldan padma'i rigs //
T02D2730:107b-6: ri rgyal po ta la yi rin chen brag phug nyams dga' bar //
T02D2730:107b-7: pad zla'i dbus na thugs rje'i sku ni 'gying zhing rol pa'i nyams //
T02D2730:107b-8: thugs rje'i sman gyis bdag nad gso ba mgon po thugs rje can //
T02D2730:107b-9: ma rig thibs po 'gro ba'i mun sel rje btsun rab rib sel //
T02D2730:107b-10: skye rga na 'chi thar dka' yang srid rtsibs drug 'khor lor chud //
T02D2730:107b-11: srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor bzlog dka' sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying //
T02D2730:107b-12: mgon po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad thugs rje'i sku yis sgrol //
T02D2730:107b-13: zla ba ltar dkar phyag gnyis padma gdung ba sel
T02D2730:107b-14: ba'i phyag / dpag med cod pan rin chen mdzes
T02D2730:107b-15: brgyan gzhon nu zhi ba'i sku //
T02D2730:107b-16: thugs rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis zug rngu'i nad dang sdug bsngal sel //
T02D2730:107b-17: thugs rje ri dvags lpags 'dzin srid pa'i bla ma phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2730:107b-18: thugs rje'i thugs gdungs spyan g-yas chab las lha mo thugs rje'i sku //
T02D2730:107b-19: yid 'ong sgrol ma ljang ser bde ma rin chen
T02D2730:107b-20: rgyan mdzes sgeg / padmo'i sku la phyag mtshan autpala
T02D2730:107b-22: bcud rgyas nu mas gso mdzad 'gro ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2730:107b-23: sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas snying rje'i chu las mdzes ma 'khrungs //
T02D2730:107b-24: khro gnyer zhi ba ser mo rin chen sku brgyan thugs rjes 'gying //
T02D2730:107b-25: rje btsun mgon gzigs phyag mtshan gus pa'i phyag rgya dbyug pa bsnams //
T02D2730:107b-26: mchog sbyin bum chus 'gro ba'i re skong yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2730:107b-27: thugs rjes phrin las dregs pa tshar dbang mdzad khro rgyal sku //
T02D2730:107b-28: sprul brgyan 'od dmar rta gdong ljang gu spyi bor rta skad bzhad //
T02D2730:107b-29: mgon po pa ne la 'dud pus btsugs rdo rje dbyug pa bsnams //
T02D2730:107b-30: padma'i rigs sprul thugs rje'i brlan gyis sgeg khro phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2730:108a-0: phyag na padma'i drung na dam chos @108a * //
T02D2730:108a-2: nor bzangs sras po gser mdog skal ldan nyid bzhugs rin chen brgyan //
T02D2730:108a-3: ae ma bla ma la gus thal sbyar pus btsugs pu sti bsnams //
T02D2730:108a-4: bzhin bzangs khye'u dad ldan nor bzangs bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2730:108a-5: rje btsun gsung gi dbang phyug kharsa p'a ni 'khor bcas la //
T02D2730:108a-6: bdag gis gus par bstod bgyis zla ltar dge ba dri med des //
T02D2730:108a-7: srid mtsho skems shing thugs rje'i chu yis skye 'gro kun ngoms nas //
T02D2730:108a-8: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga' po ta la ru
T02D2730:108a-9: skye bar shog / sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen
T02D2730:108a-10: pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa //
T02D2730:108a-11: thub pa rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yis //
T02D2730:108a-12: bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus kun //
T02D2730:108a-13: byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la
T02D2730:108a-14: reg par shog / nor bu gling gi thugs rje
T02D2730:108a-15: chen po lha lnga'i bstod pa //
